LanguageData.CommandShowSubstructureOverlayDesc: Display valid substructure in blue and invalid substructure in red.
LanguageData.CommandInspectGravEngineDesc: Choose a colonist to inspect the mysterious grav engine.
LanguageData.CommandLaunchGravshipDesc: Choose a colonist to pilot the gravship. Anything on gravship substructure will be transported to a new map. Your current map will be abandoned if you don't have a grav anchor.
LanguageData.CommandAllowFishDesc: When disabled, colonists will never fish in this zone.
LanguageData.CommandAllowRemovingApparelDesc: When disabled, haulers won't remove items from the outfit stand and colonists won't equip apparel unless ordered to do so.
LanguageData.CommandShuttleNoPilot: No colonist capable of piloting shuttle. Requires minimum piloting ability of 10%.
LanguageData.ConfirmLandGravshipDesc: Land your gravship in the landing zone.
LanguageData.AbortLandGravshipDesc: Cancel landing on this map, and force the gravship to land nearby on the world map. Useful if you can't find a landing spot.\n\nWarning: This increases the chance of a mishap when landing.
LanguageData.AbortLandConfirmation: Aborting the landing will force your gravship to land in a random nearby location on the world map. This increases the chance of a mishap when landing.\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.GravshipLandingMarkerNotPlaced: You must designate a landing area for your gravship.
LanguageData.CommandRefuelShuttleFromCargoDesc: Refuel the passenger shuttle using chemfuel stored within.
LanguageData.SealHatchDesc: Choose a colonist to permanently seal the entrance. Anything or anyone left below will be lost forever.
LanguageData.GravshipShieldOrderActivationDesc: Order a pawn to activate the gravship shield generator.
LanguageData.GravshipShieldOrderDeactivationDesc: Order a pawn to deactivate the gravship shield generator.
